# UrbanGeometryCreationZoning

## Description
This measure reads an URBANoptâ„¢ GeoJSON and creates geometry with zoning for a particular building.  Surrounding buildings are included as shading structures.

## Modeler Description


## Measure Type
ModelMeasure

## Taxonomy

**Name:** geojson_file,
**Type:** String,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,

**Name:** feature_id,
**Type:** String,
**Units:** ,

**Type:** Choice,
